data.message: hello facebook my name is Edmon Mccoy. And i have or at least i thought i had a facebook account. right now i am contacting u guys under my cousin latoya christian account. my account is or was under snapteamdjboogie. but i believe u can look it up under my name Edmon Edmon Mccoy. but somehow my ex girlfriend got into my account and change my password and i also believe she changed my email to her email. i have no way of getting into my account. i dont want to give up my page cause i have a lot of pictures on there and i am also a local dj so a lot of my clients contact me thru facbook but lately i havent been able to get in contact with no one. so can u please help me with this. even if i have to set up a new email and password i will do that i just really need my account back. thank you.

replies.message: Hey there. You can learn how to recover an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2kfCE8M. Let us know if you have any questions! -Hannah
Your story is a sad one for you and as a Facebook follower I FEEL YOUR  PAIN
Feliz aniversario face book y que siga la nueva tecnologia mas.....mas.....
